en.title: **Technical** School N°1
en.text: I completed the technical school with a title of technician in electromecanic with orientation in goods and services. With a introduction to low level programming with a PLC and a CNC machine.

es.title: **Escuela** de Educación Técnica N°1
es.text: Terminé la escuela de educación técnica con un título de técnico en electromecánica con orientación en bienes y servicios. Con una introducción a la programación de bajo nivel con un PLC y una máquina CNC.

fr.title: **Licence** en Informatique
fr.text: Obtenu une licence en Informatique, avec un accent sur les algorithmes, les structures de données, l'ingénierie logicielle et le développement web. Acquis une expérience pratique à travers divers projets de programmation et camps de formation.

ko.title: **학사** 컴퓨터 과학
ko.text: 알고리즘, 데이터 구조, 소프트웨어 공학 및 웹 개발에 중점을 둔 컴퓨터 과학 학사 학위를 취득했습니다. 다양한 프로그래밍 프로젝트와 부트캠프를 통해 실무 경험을 쌓았습니다.

en.title: **Licence** in Computer Science
en.info: Faculty of Engineering, University National of Jujuy
en.text: I started the university with a focus on software development and computer science. I learned the basics of programming and computer science, with a focus on software development. I also learned about the basics of programming and computer science.

es.title: Licenciatura en **Sistemas**
es.info: Facultad de Ingeniería, Universidad Nacional de Jujuy
es.text: Aprendí los fundamentos a la programación y a la informática, con orientación en desarrollo software. Análisis, diseño, implementación y mantenimiento de sistemas informáticos.

fr.title: Nanodiplôme en **Développement PHP**
fr.text: Terminé un programme intensif de Nanodiplôme axé sur le développement PHP, couvrant des compétences essentielles telles que la programmation backend, la gestion de bases de données et le déploiement d'applications web. Ce cours a fourni une base solide dans les pratiques modernes de PHP.

ko.title: PHP 개발 **나노디그리**
ko.text: PHP 개발에 중점을 둔 집중 나노디그리 프로그램을 완료하여 백엔드 프로그래밍, 데이터베이스 관리 및 웹 애플리케이션 배포와 같은 필수 기술을 배웠습니다. 이 과정은 현대 PHP 실무에 대한 탄탄한 기초를 제공했습니다.

en.title: **Analyst** Programmer University
en.info: Faculty of Engineering, University National of Jujuy
en.text:
With a focus on software development and programming in itself, I opted for the Analyst Programmer University course to put into practice my knowledge and skills in the real world, with technologies like:

  • SpringBoot
  • Implementation of systems with Docker
  • Angular

I applied self-taught research and theory to develop practical solutions to the requested works.

es.title: **Analista** Programador Universitario
es.info: Facultad de Ingeniería, Universidad Nacional de Jujuy
es.text:
Con un enfoque en el desarrollo de software y la programación en sí, opté por estudiar la carrera de Analista Programador Universitario para poner en práctica mis conocimientos y habilidades en el mundo real, con tecnologías como:

  • SpringBoot
  • Implementación de sistemas con Docker
  • Angular

Apliqué investigación autodidacta y teoría para desarrollar soluciones prácticas a los trabajos solicitados.

fr.title: **Master** en Intelligence Artificielle
fr.text:
J'ai terminé un programme de Master complet axé sur les sujets de pointe en IA, y compris:

  • Apprentissage Automatique
  • Traitement du Langage Naturel (TLN)
  • Réseaux Neuronaux

J'ai appliqué la recherche et la théorie pour développer des solutions IA pratiques, alliant excellence académique et innovation réelle.

ko.title: 인공지능 **석사**
ko.text:
최첨단 인공지능 주제에 중점을 둔 석사 과정을 완료했습니다. 다룬 주제는 다음과 같습니다:

  • 머신러닝
  • 자연어 처리 (NLP)
  • 신경망

연구와 이론을 실제 AI 솔루션 개발에 적용하여 학문적 우수성과 실질적 혁신을 결합했습니다.
